Posts.Content:
I need to go for a stereotactic biopsy soon and I am looking for a recommendation in the New York area. 
My Dr. recommended the Dobbs Ferry Ashikari Breast Center, but I don't know anything about
 the place.
Where should I go? Columbia Presbyterian has a breast cancer clinic too, as does the White Plains Hospital.
Any advice?
Posts.Title: Can anyone recommend a good place for STEREOTACTIC BIOPSY in the New York area?

Posts.Content:
I live in the New York area and I need a stereotactic biopsy and i don't know where to go. Can anyone recommend a good place for the biopsy? I don't want it messed up.
Where did you have yours done?
Posts.Title: I need a stereotactic biopsy
